creator: Yapı ve Kredi Bankası A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
Your health is precious to us! We stand next to you with our technologies in these days that we need to live without contact.
You can make your banking transactions easily and securely from Yapı Kredi Mobile.
• Deposit / Withdraw cash via QR code without touching ATM.
• Make payment via QR code at POS without using your card.
• Make in-car payment without getting off your car at Opet stations.
EFT/Remittance transactions from Yapı Kredi Mobile are free until April 30!
#StayHealthy with technologies of Yapı Kredi Mobile

Yapı Kredi Mobile provides you faster transactions and easy asset management. Plus we continuously enhance our banking services with brand new features.
Yapı Kredi Mobile is now serving both our Retail and Corporate customers. All retail and corporate customers will be able to perform their financial transactions from anywhere they want with a single application.

You can login to Yapı Kredi Mobile by defining your eyes thanks to Eyeprint-ID feature. You can define your Eyeprint-ID description in the "Eyeprint-ID Activation" step under the "Settings" menu. With Yapı Kredi Mobile, you can quickly view your retail & corporate accounts and credit cards on homepage. With the advanced search feature, you can easily access the transactions you want to perform. You can also withdraw money quickly via QR code without touching the ATM if you are individual user.

We kindly remind you that you can login to Yapı Kredi Retail & Corporate Mobile with your current password. If you are individual user, you can also create a new password from Get Password / I Forgot My Password menu.

We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You are always welcome to send your feedback via www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/
descriptionShort: Make life easier with totally renewed Yapı Kredi Mobile!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update;
·With Card Tracking, you can easily track the entire journey of your newly applied and renewed cards.
·Easily access all insurance products including newly added Complementary Health Insurance and Compulsory Earthquake Insurance from new Insurances menu.
·Add a mobile phone number and select it as your OTP SMS number with Video Chat Assistant without going to a branch.
·You can change fund distribution of your private pensions.
·You can purchase Vodafone packages.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have great news for you! Yapı Kredi Mobile has been renewed with a more modern and simpler design. You can perform your banking transactions more easily through Yapı Kredi Mobile.
With this update;
·You can view your e-mail messages together with your notifications from a single place, by clicking on message icon on the home page.
·You can invest in the distribution of assets suitable for your Investor Profile with Investment Packages.
·Yapı Kredi PAY is renewed as World PAY!

·You can purchase and sell second-hand vehicles.

·With My Tracking List, you can track your favorite stocks’ live prices and change information. This feature will be available gradually.

·You can view Turkish Lira/Foreign Currency distribution of your assets.
·You can add money to your deposit accounts on their maturity date.

• Make in-car payment without getting off your car at Opet stations.

#StayHealthy with technologies of Yapı Kredi Mobile

Yapı Kredi Mobile provides you faster transactions and easy asset management. Plus we continuously enhance our banking services with brand new features.
Yapı Kredi Mobile is now serving both our Retail and Corporate customers. All retail and corporate customers will be able to perform their financial transactions from anywhere they want with a single application.
 
You can login to Yapı Kredi Mobile by defining your eyes thanks to Eyeprint-ID feature. You can define your Eyeprint-ID description in the "Eyeprint-ID Activation" step under the "Settings" menu. With Yapı Kredi Mobile, you can quickly view your retail & corporate accounts and credit cards on homepage. With the advanced search feature, you can easily access the transactions you want to perform. You can also withdraw money quickly via QR code without touching the ATM if you are individual user.
 
We kindly remind you that you can login to Yapı Kredi Retail & Corporate Mobile with your current password. If you are individual user, you can also create a new password from Get Password / I Forgot My Password menu.
 
We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You are always welcome to send your feedback via www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/
descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

·You can add money to your deposit accounts on their maturity date.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update;
· On January 8, a new era in money transfers begins! With the FAST system, money transfers to other banks will be available 24/7! Now you can also transfer money to Easy Addresses such as mobile phones instead of IBAN. You can define your own information such as mobile phone, e-mail as Easy Addresses for your account from the Account Detail step.
· If you do not have a card in our bank, you can now easily set your new login password by connecting to Video Chat Assistants.

You can login to Yapı Kredi Mobile by defining your eyes thanks to Eyeprint-ID feature. You can define your Eyeprint-ID description in the "Eyeprint-ID Activation" step under the "Settings" menu. With Yapı Kredi Mobile, you can quickly view your retail & corporate accounts and credit cards on homepage. With the advanced search feature, you can easily access the transactions you want to perform. You can also withdraw money quickly via QR code without touching the ATM if you are individual user.
 
We kindly remind you that you can login to Yapı Kredi Retail & Corporate Mobile with your current password. If you are individual user, you can also create a new password from Get Password / I Forgot My Password menu.
 
We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You are always welcome to send your feedback via www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/
descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

· Even if you have made a commitment for your pension to another bank, you can make a Bank Change pre-application from the SSI Pension Transactions step. You can also use the Promotion Renewal step to extend your pension commitment to our bank.
· You can transfer points between your cards from the Card Detail - Point Information step.
· You can make money transfer to your accounts on Yapı Kredi Invest FXBox platform.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update;

· You can easily access the renewed World PAY screen from the home page.
· You can apply for a prepaid card from the My Cards/Applications step.

title: Yapı Kredi Mobile

creator: Yapı ve Kredi Bankası A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
You can make your banking transactions easily and securely from Yapı Kredi Mobile without contact. You can withdraw and deposit money via QR code without touching the ATM, make payment via QR code at the POS, and make payments at Opet stations without getting out of your car with in-car payment.

You can complete your cash and shopping needs in seconds with the application and usage steps of Personal Consumer Loan, Credit Card and Flexible Account. You can easily follow the entire journey of your newly applied and renewed cards from the moment of application with Card Tracking. You can apply for many insurance products such as Casco, Supplementary Health Insurance and DASK.

Even if you do not have your wallet or cards with you, you can complete your payments with World PAY.

Our corporate customers can easily approve the transactions that come to their approval if authorization is required. At the same time, they can apply for Merchant and Loan applications, paychecks & bills and monitor the transactions of their account details.

You can instantly complete your account opening transactions with digital approval by connecting to our video transaction assistants with Yapı Kredi Mobile, and become a Yapı Kredi customer immediately and have the privilege of doing your banking transactions 24/7 from anywhere.

As an individual user, you can sign up to Yapı Kredi Mobil with your user code or ID number. You can log in with your ID number and your current password, or you can get a new password from the Get Password / Forgot Password menu. As a corporate user, you can log in with your company code, user code and current password.

We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You can reach us at www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/ for all your opinions and suggestions.
descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update;
On retail and corporate menus;
· You can now make your money transfers to other banks using a QR code 24/7 with FAST.
On retail menus;
· You can inquire about your actions regarding your investment packages.
· You can easily track your card points and discounts with the My Earnings menu.
On corporate menus;
· You can apply to POS for your company.
· You can share your IBAN belonging to your deposits with QR Code.

With this update;
On retail and corporate menus;

On retail menus;

On corporate menus;

title: Yapı Kredi Mobile

creator: Yapı ve Kredi Bankası A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
You can make your banking transactions easily and securely from Yapı Kredi Mobile without contact. You can withdraw and deposit money via QR code without touching the ATM, make payment via QR code at the POS, and make payments at Opet stations without getting out of your car with in-car payment.

You can complete your cash and shopping needs in seconds with the application and usage steps of Personal Consumer Loan, Credit Card and Flexible Account. You can easily follow the entire journey of your newly applied and renewed cards from the moment of application with Card Tracking. You can apply for many insurance products such as Casco, Supplementary Health Insurance and DASK.

Even if you do not have your wallet or cards with you, you can complete your payments with World PAY.

Our corporate customers can easily approve the transactions that come to their approval if authorization is required. At the same time, they can apply for Merchant and Loan applications, paychecks & bills and monitor the transactions of their account details.

You can instantly complete your account opening transactions with digital approval by connecting to our video transaction assistants with Yapı Kredi Mobile, and become a Yapı Kredi customer immediately and have the privilege of doing your banking transactions 24/7 from anywhere.

As an individual user, you can sign up to Yapı Kredi Mobil with your user code or ID number. You can log in with your ID number and your current password, or you can get a new password from the Get Password / Forgot Password menu. As a corporate user, you can log in with your company code, user code and current password.

We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You can reach us at www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/ for all your opinions and suggestions.

creator: Yapı ve Kredi Bankası A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
You can make your banking transactions easily and securely from Yapı Kredi Mobile without contact. You can withdraw and deposit money via QR code without touching the ATM, make payment via QR code at the POS, and make payments at Opet stations without getting out of your car with in-car payment.

You can complete your cash and shopping needs in seconds with the application and usage steps of Personal Consumer Loan, Credit Card and Flexible Account. You can easily follow the entire journey of your newly applied and renewed cards from the moment of application with Card Tracking. You can apply for many insurance products such as Casco, Supplementary Health Insurance and DASK.

Even if you do not have your wallet or cards with you, you can complete your payments with World PAY.

Our corporate customers can easily approve the transactions that come to their approval if authorization is required. At the same time, they can apply for Merchant and Loan applications, paychecks & bills and monitor the transactions of their account details.

You can instantly complete your account opening transactions with digital approval by connecting to our video transaction assistants with Yapı Kredi Mobile, and become a Yapı Kredi customer immediately and have the privilege of doing your banking transactions 24/7 from anywhere.

As an individual user, you can sign up to Yapı Kredi Mobil with your user code or ID number. You can log in with your ID number and your current password, or you can get a new password from the Get Password / Forgot Password menu. As a corporate user, you can log in with your company code, user code and current password.

We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You can reach us at www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/ for all your opinions and suggestions.
descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update,
On Retail menus;
· You can make note payments on someone else’s behalf from the Payments menu.
· You can easily apply for Supplementary Card to your family and relatives.
· You can view your Flexible Account interest debt and increase your limit automatically.

On Corporate menus;
· You can make note payments on someone else’s behalf from the Cash Management menu.

With this update,
On Retail/Corporate Menus:

descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update,
On Retail Menus;
· You can renew your pension promotion even before the end of the contract on mobile.
· You can get a reminder by adding your vehicle inspection date to My Car+.
· With Digital Platform Payment Subscriptions, you can view your Visa credit cards that have been registered to foreign-based firms and manage your payment orders.
· You can make your on-campus payments at contracted universities by activating your E-Campus from the World Pay.

title: Yapı Kredi Mobile

creator: Yapı ve Kredi Bankası A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
You can make your banking transactions easily and securely from Yapı Kredi Mobile without contact. You can withdraw and deposit money via QR code without touching the ATM, make payment via QR code at the POS, and make payments at Opet stations without getting out of your car with in-car payment.

You can complete your cash and shopping needs in seconds with the application and usage steps of Personal Consumer Loan, Credit Card and Flexible Account. You can easily follow the entire journey of your newly applied and renewed cards from the moment of application with Card Tracking. You can apply for many insurance products such as Casco, Supplementary Health Insurance and DASK.

Even if you do not have your wallet or cards with you, you can complete your payments with World PAY.

Our corporate customers can easily approve the transactions that come to their approval if authorization is required. At the same time, they can apply for Merchant and Loan applications, paychecks & bills and monitor the transactions of their account details.

You can instantly complete your account opening transactions with digital approval by connecting to our video transaction assistants with Yapı Kredi Mobile, and become a Yapı Kredi customer immediately and have the privilege of doing your banking transactions 24/7 from anywhere.

As an individual user, you can sign up to Yapı Kredi Mobil with your user code or ID number. You can log in with your ID number and your current password, or you can get a new password from the Get Password / Forgot Password menu. As a corporate user, you can log in with your company code, user code and current password.

We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You can reach us at www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/ for all your opinions and suggestions.

descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update;

•You can quickly transfer money to international accounts with Yapı Kredi Global Fast.

•You can compare international money transfer methods with “Which Is The Most Suitable Transfer Option?”, and you can perform your transfer by choosing the method that suits you best.

•You can contribute to Private Pension contracts of your loved ones with the gift code shared with you.

•With On-Off Safe Household Insurance you can seasonally insure your home by using start-stop feature.

descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update;
·You can apply for your mortgage loan from mobile and upload your documents digitally without going to the branch.
·You can apply for Cyber Protection Insurance.
·You can add and track your accounts in other banks.
·You can easily make your credit card debt payment and open a time deposit account by bringing money from your accounts in other banks.
·You can access all QR transactions form Jet QR.
·You can view World Pay campaigns from the World Pay.

title: Yapı Kredi Mobile

creator: Yapı ve Kredi Bankası A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
You can make your banking transactions easily and securely from Yapı Kredi Mobile without contact. You can withdraw and deposit money via QR code without touching the ATM, make payment via QR code at the POS, and make payments at Opet stations without getting out of your car with in-car payment.

You can complete your cash and shopping needs in seconds with the application and usage steps of Personal Consumer Loan, Credit Card and Flexible Account. You can easily follow the entire journey of your newly applied and renewed cards from the moment of application with Card Tracking. You can apply for many insurance products such as Casco, Supplementary Health Insurance and DASK.

Even if you do not have your wallet or cards with you, you can complete your payments with World PAY.

Our corporate customers can easily approve the transactions that come to their approval if authorization is required. At the same time, they can apply for Merchant and Loan applications, paychecks & bills and monitor the transactions of their account details.

You can instantly complete your account opening transactions with digital approval by connecting to our video transaction assistants with Yapı Kredi Mobile, and become a Yapı Kredi customer immediately and have the privilege of doing your banking transactions 24/7 from anywhere.

As an individual user, you can sign up to Yapı Kredi Mobil with your user code or ID number. You can log in with your ID number and your current password, or you can get a new password from the Get Password / Forgot Password menu. As a corporate user, you can log in with your company code, user code and current password.

We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You can reach us at www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/ for all your opinions and suggestions.

descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Yapı Kredi Mobile, the application of your life!
With Yapı Kredi Mobile which we have constantly developed to make your life easier, everything you would not expect from a banking application for you and your loved ones is in one place!
With “My World” you can provide your vehicle and home needs and reminders
With “My Other Banks” you can manage all your bank accounts!
In the corporate menu, you can follow your cash flow, receive notifications and view special recommendations with “My Cash Flow”

descriptionShort: Meet Yapı Kredi Mobile’s Life-Enhancing Technologies!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update;

Sole proprietorships can access suitable commercial products for their banking needs through Yapı Kredi Mobile by logging in with their personal accounts and clicking on the “My Business” menu. When they want to apply for these products, they can directly switch to the corporate menus.

You can apply for retirement account for your retirement process in Yapı Kredi Mobile by following My Accounts > Pensioner Banking > SGK Retirement Application steps that lead to E-Government.

You can log in with your ID number and your current password, or you can get a new password from the Get Password / Forgot Password menu. As a corporate user, you can log in with your company code, user code and current password.

You can track your Step level and monitor the paper savings you achieve from your sustainable choices through the new profile tab added to Step. Additionally, you can now earn Step points with your daily steps, and we guarantee that your information will not be shared with third parties.

We continue to improve our applications in line with your valuable opinions and suggestions. You can reach us at www.facebook.com/YapiKredi, www.twitter.com/yapikredihizmet and http://www.yapikredi.com.tr/memnuniyetiniz-icin-buradayiz/ for all your opinions and suggestions.

title:
Yapı Kredi Mobile - SuperApp
4.0.24

creator: Yapı ve Kredi Bankası A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Yapı Kredi Mobile Superapp! 💙

With Turkey's most beloved mobile banking app, you can perform hundreds of transactions in one place for both retail and corporate customers.



Yapı Kredi Mobile is Now a Part of Your Life

Yapı Kredi Mobile evolves with super technologies and continues to break boundaries. Get ready to find all the solutions you need in one place!

• MyCar+: Everything from paying Motor Vehicle Tax and delay notifications to HGS transactions, special insurance offers and up to 40% discount on car rentals with Avis is in MyCar+.
• MyHome+: Add your home as an owner or tenant and manage all your home-related needs in one place.
• MyTravel+: Access Setur Travel Line, Avis car rentals, travel health insurance and more from one place. Plan your trips easily.
• MyBank+: Monitor all your bank accounts, manage money transfers and payments through Yapı Kredi Mobile alone.



Banking Experience Made Easy with Yapı Kredi Mobile!

• Become a Customer Quickly: Connect with our video transaction assistants via Yapı Kredi Mobile to instantly become an Yapı Kredi customer.
• Find ATMs and Branches: Locate the nearest Yapı Kredi ATM and branch, and book an appointment without visiting the branch.
• Contactless Banking: Perform dozens of banking services contact-free, from QR Mobile payment solutions and withdrawing/depositing money without touching the ATM, to sending money easily without writing an IBAN.
• Easy Transactions: Perform banking transactions like account operations, credit card transactions, money transfers, payments, loan transactions and many more with ease.
• Financial Services: Track loans, funds, foreign exchange calculations, interest rates, exchange rates and market information. Access campaign information.



Best Solutions for Payments on Yapı Kredi Mobile

• QR Transfer: Make money transfers with a QR code without an account number or IBAN.
• Digital Codes: Quickly purchase digital codes from Milli Piyango to Microsoft, Razer Gold to Zula.
• City Cards: Load balance to many transit cards such as Istanbul Kart, Başkent Kart, Izmirim Kart.
• Bill Payment: Pay nearly 300 different bills and set up automatic payment orders.



Yapı Kredi is Here for You When You Need It!

• Personal Loans: Apply for a personal loan instantly via Yapı Kredi Mobile and receive the funds directly into your account, without visiting a branch!
• Credit Cards: Apply for the credit card that suits your needs, and have it delivered to your door!
• Insurance Services: Create policies for Auto Insurance, Supplementary Health Insurance, and Compulsory Earthquake Insurance.
• Private Pension System (PPS): Easily adjust the fund distribution of your pension plan. Take advantage of the fund distribution packages we recommend.



Revamped Investments Menu at Your Service

• My Portfolio: Control your investments from a single screen.
• Markets: Instantly access live market tracking and news.
• Smart Broker: View stock recommendations and invest.
• Foreign Exchange / Gold: Carry out currency and gold buying/selling transactions anytime.
• Cross Currency Transactions: Exchange foreign currencies among different currencies.
• Foreign Stocks: Execute your stock transactions in international markets quickly and securely.

World PAY with You Even Without Your Cards

• QR Code Payment: Complete your shopping by scanning the QR code on the POS device.
• Digital Slip Technology: Quickly access slips for your cards. Easily track the refund and warranty periods of your expenditures.


For Our Corporate Customers on Yapı Kredi Mobile

• Easy Login: Log in instantly with your Company Code, User Code and internet branch password. Easily approve transactions awaiting your approval.
• Quick Switch: Easily switch between retail and corporate users.
• Credit Transactions: Use installment commercial loans, manage checks & promissory notes and track account details transactions.

Revamped Investments Menu at Your Service

• My Portfolio: Control your investments from a single screen.
• Markets: Instantly access live market tracking and news.
• Smart Broker: View stock recommendations and invest.
• Foreign Exchange / Gold: Carry out currency and gold buying/selling transactions anytime.
• Cross Currency Transactions: Exchange foreign currencies among different currencies.
• Foreign Stocks: Execute your stock transactions in international markets quickly and securely.

World PAY with You Even Without Your Cards

• QR Code Payment: Complete your shopping by scanning the QR code on the POS device.
• Digital Slip Technology: Quickly access slips for your cards. Easily track the refund and warranty periods of your expenditures.


For Our Corporate Customers on Yapı Kredi Mobile

• Easy Login: Log in instantly with your Company Code, User Code and internet branch password. Easily approve transactions awaiting your approval.
• Quick Switch: Easily switch between retail and corporate users.
• Credit Transactions: Use installment commercial loans, manage checks & promissory notes and track account details transactions.
